articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: Harrington picks Lowry for Ryder Cup and leaves out Justin Rose - The Guardian
articles.description: Captain Padraig Harrington has left Justin Rose out of Europe’s Ryder Cup team, picking Ian Poulter, Sergio García and Shane Lowry instead
articles.content:
Golf
  • Poulter and García are the other captains choices
  • Billy Horschel of USA wins PGA Championship
Justin Rose was the high-profile casualty as Padraig Harrington confirmed … [+4677 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Watch a NASA spacewalk to prepare for a space station power boost - CNN
articles.description: European Space Agency astronaut Thomas Pesquet and Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency astronaut Akihiko Hoshide embarked on a spacewalk outside the International Space Station on Sunday to prepare for more solar array upgrades.
